description: This file defines various enums, classes, and data structures related to user filtering criteria such as hair color, race, religion, height and weight ranges. It is primarily used for specifying filter preferences in the application.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A generic class representing a numeric range with minimum and maximum bounds, including serialization and deserialization methods.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable class that encapsulates user filter preferences including categorical selections (hair colors, races, religions) and numeric ranges (height, weight). Provides methods for copying, equality checks, serialization/deserialization, and string conversion.

methods.name: filterCriteria.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a new FilterCriteria instance with specified overrides for the existing properties.

methods.name: filterCriteria.toJson
methods.description: Serializes the filter criteria object into a JSON map with string representations of enums and range maps.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a FilterCriteria instance from a JSON map, safely handling malformed data and falling back to defaults.

methods.name: filterCriteria.toJsonString
methods.description: Converts the FilterCriteria object into a compact JSON string.

methods.name: FilterCriteria.tryFromJsonString
methods.description: Parses a JSON string into a FilterCriteria object, returning null if parsing fails.

methods.name: Range.fromJsonDouble
methods.description: Creates a Range<double> object from a JSON map containing 'min' and 'max' values.
